intent_atoms.description: ParseIssueStore aggregate must record tolerant parsing events and expose query helpers for downstream consumers.
Thread ParseIssueStore through ParsePipeline, CLI environment, and ParseTreeStore to propagate tolerant parsing issues.
Surface ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specs are finalized.

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore aggregate
functional_units.description: Records tolerant parsing events and provides query helpers for accessing stored issues

functional_units.name: Metrics publishing for ParseIssueStore
functional_units.description: Publishes metrics related to tolerant parsing events

functional_units.name: Threaded ParseIssueStore through ParsePipeline
functional_units.description: Propagates tolerant parsing issues to downstream consumers via the parse pipeline

functional_units.name: Integration with CLI environment
functional_units.description: Makes ParseIssueStore available in command-line interface operations

functional_units.name: Integration with ParseTreeStore state
functional_units.description: Stores and exposes parsed tree issues within application state

functional_units.name: Unit tests for ParseIssueStore behavior
functional_units.description: Provides automated test coverage for store functionality
